front.title: Representation of PIV chain-of-trust for import and export

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: This document provides a common XML-based data representation of a chain-of-trust record to facilitate the exchange of Personal Identity Verification (PIV) Card enrollment data. The exchanged record is the basis to personalize a PIV Card for a transferred employee and also for service providers to personalize a PIV Card on behave of client federal agencies.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
